Title: Relates to license requirements for professional geologists; repealer
Summary: Provides that the education requirements to be licensed as a professional geologist may be partially substituted by practical experience; relates to the issuance of an identification card as a geologist in training.
LawCode: Rpld ยง7206-b sub 2, amd ยง7206-b, Ed L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the education law, in relation to the licensure of a professional geologist; and to repeal subdivision 2 of section 7206-b of the education law relating thereto
